#US #USA #pv2d #pv_2d #rocket #rockets #tiny_tim #userskin #usersight #plane #collimator #sight

Update 2-14-25: Reformatted to use BiCubic MipMaps without error/gamma correction. This will provide superior clarity, especially on lower resolutions.

Tiny Tim sight for the PV-2D. Intended for use at 600m and generally around 400kmh. Shots at 2000m are possible when IAS is around 440kmh.

Install by unzipping included UserSkins folder to War Thunder root directory and combine with any existing folder.

#US #USA #France #UK #Britain #f6f #f6f_3 #f6f_5 #f6fhellcat #hellcat #avenger #rocket #rockets #tiny_tim #uncle_tom #hvar #userskin #usersight #plane #collimator #sight

Update 2-14-25: Reformatted to use BiCubic MipMaps without error/gamma correction. This will provide superior clarity, especially on lower resolutions.

F6F collimator sight for use with Tiny Tim rockets for all 3 nations that get them. Intended for use at 600m and sighted for speeds at 400, 450, and 500+ kmh. Make sure belly is level before launching, and remember that Tims are slow and need a little more guiding!

Chinese Top Tier MBT custom sight pack

To change the color of sight use your "Crosshair lighting" keybind.

Compatibility: WZ-1001, VT4A1, ZTZ99A, ZTZ-99-II/III

Installation: Unzip/extract the file and paste them inside your Warthunder folder in WarThunder > UserSights.

!WARNING! The FOV and zoom level doesn't allow me to hide the text when zoomed in like on other sights.
The sight is compatible with the new system and you can decide the colors of the sight in normal, highlight, nv and ir modes, aswell as applying the new rangefinder, reload timer and...

#anime #yurucamp #nadeshiko

There are 4 files for 4 sizes depending on how high or low your tank optical zoom is.

Revamped Semi-Realistic Clean M1 Abrams Sight

The reticle is based from this post: https://live.warthunder.com/post/1088886/en/

In the original sight, I found the borders and the "interference" effect, which causes a black square to move across the screen when zooming in, to be very distracting and impractical for normal War Thunder gameplay. To improve the sight, I removed all of those effects.

I also sampled colors from Oxide’s "Will To Kill" video to more accurately replicate the Abrams gunsight colors. Both the rangefinder and reticle have a cleaner color hue compare...

I've been wanting to convert the original illustrations I drew into SVG files and apply them to a custom scope, but I don't know how. So I drew each line with a line, but it was very difficult. Is there a good way?

Sylphy sighting on all tanks
#anime #anime #animegirls #mushoku_tensei #mushokutensei #Sylphy

INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS:
1. Download the Zip file and unzip it.
2. Go to the root folder of the game, find the UserSights folder (if it doesn't exist, create it, and then in it ‘all_tanks’) and move the unzipped file to the All_Tanks folder.
3. Start the game, go to Settings > General combat settings > Sight settings. Repeat several times, selecting tanks in the hangar in turn, to set the sight on each tank.
4. Enjoy!

If you don't have the UserSights folder displayed in the root folder of...

#semihistorical #semi_historical #semihistoric #m1 #m1a1 #m1a1hc #m1a1aim #m1ip #ipm1 #m1a2 #m1a2sep #m1a2sepv2 #abrams #modern #m60 #m60a3tts #mbt #fcs

BMP-3 or BMD-4 Artillery Sight

Capable indirect-fire sight with an elevation indicator to show angle difference between scope and cannon barrel of the BMP-3 /BMD-4 vehicles to get a feel for obstacles (tested with the shell "3OF70", shell type should not influence the elevation indicator angle)

  • ranges up to supported 5800 meters
  • elevation indicator
  • center clear circle to pinpoint fire
  • further customizable in the new system for night vision or thermal
